Access and download data on plant and animal populations from NatureCounts

Source: R/naturecounts-pkg.R
naturecounts-package.Rd

naturecounts is an R package for accessing and downloading data on plant and animal populations from various databases through NatureCounts, a service managed by Bird Studies Canada.

Details

See the vignettes (vignettes(package = "naturecounts"), or at https://birdscanada.github.io/naturecounts for getting started!

See also

Useful links:

  • https://github.com/BirdsCanada/naturecounts

  • https://naturecounts.ca

  • https://birdscanada.github.io/naturecounts/

Maintainer: Denis Lepage dlepage@birdscanada.org
